name: Tap It Away
description:
Relieve your stress, relax your mind! Clear the level!
 

Tap the blocks to make them fly away and clear the screen. But the blocks will only fly in one direction, so you’ve got to approach this brain teaser carefully! As you progress, the blocks form bigger and bigger shapes, and the blocks themselves change form, so you’ll need to get your thinking hat on to solve the puzzles in this fun puzzle game. And that’s not it! There are skins you can unlock as you get further, as well as many challenges to keep you on your toes. In this fun and colorful game, you challenge your logic, critical thinking, and precision.
 

More than 600 tapping levels! A large number of game mechanics will make you think about brain solving various problems. This game is fun and very entertaining. Available for all kind of players.
